NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Maritime and Labor or the cell corresponding to Intermodal and Safety?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Maritime} and {Labor} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Warehousing and Labor or the cell corresponding to Road and Reliability?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Road} and {Reliability} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.23 to 0.34?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Intermodal, Compliance), (Maritime, Efficiency), (Rail, Labor), (Customs, Reliability), (Maritime, Reliability), (Customs, Safety), (Road, Safety)}.
